body:
All Versions

  • Exports: Fixed issue with exports failing due to authentication error on logo.
  • Announcements: Added expiration date.
  • User accounts: Trim trailing spaces on email name.
  • User accounts: Allow "+" to be used in email addresses.
  • Tagging: Prevent tagging when provider has a non-persistent id and display a message: "Unable to tag this provider. The NPI for this provider is missing or unconfirmed."
